rows.title: What is the difference between the Referral and Affiliate program?
rows.content: The Affiliate Program and Referral Program are two equally great initiatives but they do have differences. Therefore, itâ€™s best to understand both to see which one is suitable for you. The Referral Program rewards the referrer and the referee with a once off payment of $10 AUD worth of Bitcoin each. Being a part of the Affiliate Program is different as you will not receive a once off $10 Bitcoin reward. Instead, you will earn ongoing commissions from your affiliate based on their trading fees. For more information regarding both programs, see our help article here.

rows.title: Can I use both the Referral and Affiliate program?
rows.content: Users can utilise either the Referral or Affiliate program at their discretion. New users are only able to enter one code when signing up, so the referrer will need to keep this in mind when providing a code to the new user.

rows.title: Can I refer more than one person to CoinPort?
rows.content: Users can refer unlimited people to CoinPort utilising their referral code and we will reward you each time with $10 of Bitcoin.

rows.title: When are Referral Bonuses paid?
rows.content: Bonuses for referrals are paid at the beginning of each month, based on activity for the previous month.
